Package com.atakmap.android.bloodhound.ui

Class BloodHoundRouteWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.tak.platform.binding.AbstractPropertyBindingObject<IMapWidget>
      • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MapWidget
        • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MapWidget2
          • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MarkerIconWidget
            • com.atakmap.android.bloodhound.ui.BloodHoundRouteWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RouteNavigator.RouteNavigatorListener, MapWidget.OnClickListener, MapWidget.OnLongPressListener, IPropertyBindingObject<IMapWidget>, IMapWidget, IMarkerIconWidget
    public class BloodHoundRouteWidget
extends MarkerIconWidget
implements MapWidget.OnClickListener, MapWidget.OnLongPressListener, RouteNavigator.RouteNavigatorListener
    A button to press that toggles the bloodhound tool from "R&B line" mode to "route mode".
